meanings: be more difficult than one may think

vlive.korean: "의외로 'Double Knot'은 쉽던데?" 그래요? ""Double Knot" was easier than I thought though" Oh yeah? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 25 🦊
vlive.english: ""Double Knot" was easier than I thought though" Oh yeah?

vlive.korean: 오~ 진짜 의외로 먹을만해! - 맛이 근데 괜찮지? Oh. It's not that bad! - It tastes OK, right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [CIX] ~호로로록 쭈와아아압 막내즈의 우당탕탕 무국물 마시기~ (JINYOUNG&HYUNSUK drinking chicken radish soup)
vlive.english: Oh. It's not that bad! - It tastes OK, right?

vlive.korean: [의외로 진지하게 임하는 태현] 감독님 잘 들어오죠 목소리? [TAEHYUN looks serious] Director, can you hear my voice well? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
vlive.english: [TAEHYUN looks serious] Director, can you hear my voice well?

vlive.korean: 의외로 - 네, 뭐... I didn't see that coming... - Well... 듣기 View video GOT7 : [FULL] GOT7 SHOWCASE
vlive.english: I didn't see that coming... - Well...

vlive.korean: 84.8? 나 의외로 높네? 84.8? Wow I have a lot of followers. 듣기 View video OSEN : LEE JIN HYUK 이진혁, '스타로드'에 뜬 아기 태양 #01
vlive.english: 84.8? Wow I have a lot of followers.
